name: The Stroke of Midnight
description: Rowan Cox wakes up in a barren room, alone with a mysterious girl he's never seen before. He quickly comes to realise that things are very much out of place. A full-length Mystery/Detective visual novel with an LGBT-inclusive cast.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
